Reviews.Title: “Very convenient!”
Reviews.Author: Andrey V
Reviews.Content: It is a very convenient place to stay in Rome! There is a direct train from Fiumichino Airport to the hotel (just 200 meters away). Furthermore, there is a direct express bus (60) to the city center (Piazza Venezia), which is very convenient and fast. You can also get the 90/90D bus to and from Termini Station, which stops in front of the hotel. The property is relatively new, so it is very nice inside - both the public areas and rooms. The staff at the reception was friendly and helpful. At the bar not that much, but again in the satisfactory minimum. As a whole, I can definetely recommend the hotel to all travellers. Cheers!

Reviews.Title: “pleasant staff”
Reviews.Author: monet1173
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with a group of friends with children. Clean hotel and very nice staff. Breakfast was good with plenty of choices. As we are going out early and wont have the opportunity for breakfast, the staff prepared food for us to take on our trip and even gave us extra. There is a free wifi.

Reviews.Title: “High end modern hotel”
Reviews.Author: caretaker69
Reviews.Content: The Art Hotel Noba is a very modern and well located property. Only a short 15 min trip into the centre of Rome, bus stop is right outside. Take the No. 90 bus but most will head into centre. You have to take the 90 bus when heading back to hotel. Hotel is clean, staff freindly and helpful, breakfast is nice and plenty of it, bar prices are good for Rome, only 2.50 Euro for bottle of beer, restraunt has nice food at reasonable prices. Our room was a good size on forth floor with a nice bathroom, road noise was not loud enough to keep you awake. I would stay there again and recomend it to freinds. A good tip is to buy an all day bus ticket for only 4 Euro's which will take you anywhere in the city for about 12 hours on the bus or underground ( Metro )

Reviews.Title: “Overall nice”
Reviews.Author: Guest0987
Reviews.Content: Nice new hotel. It is not in the center which must be understood before booking. Single room was small, literally I had difficulties to put all my things, bathroom was perfect. TV system was complicated but lots of foreign channels. Very good breakfast for 3 stars hotel (coffee from coffee machine wasn't so good). The only one complaint, I don't know what for they turned on music in the corridors on a Sunday morning.

Reviews.Title: “Very good option”
Reviews.Author: Kalcenter
Reviews.Content: Excellent option not so far from the city centre (15 minutes by bus). Everything in this hotel is amazing. The room is fully equipped, very clean and warm. The staff is helpful. There´s free internet but wireless just in the reception floor, in the room you need to use a cable to connect. Breakfast very tasteful. There´s some restaurant option around. Recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleasant Stay”
Reviews.Author: Harris R
Reviews.Content: Had a very pleasant 6 day stay in this hotel. Ride to the heart of Rome was 15-20 min but to take the express bus there was a 5 min walk. The staff was very helpful, the rooms were clean and the bed very comfortable. The breakfast was good with scrambled eggs, bacon, bread, croissants and fruits The bathroom had a flexible shower head but there was no overhead structure to hold the shower head (we were told that some rooms do not have this feature!). However on our second day they fixed a structure to hold the shower head. The barrier to prevent the water getting on to the floor was not big enough to prevent water spillage; so had to be careful in taking showers. We had an issue with Best Western headquarters not having our reservation even though the hotel had the reservation. The issue was resolved on transit to Rome from USA but this gave some unnecessary anxiety and wasted time. The headquarters was not helpful in trying to resolve this. They need to improve their service on this.
